content: yarnster is your new go to slouch hat featuring a lovely openwork mesh stitch the yarnster shows off the gorgeous subtle colorways of that fave yarn you ve been crushing on **yarn** 1 skein malabrigo rastita 310yds/283m 100% merino wool shown in lotus colorway dk **needles** us 5 / 3 75mm needle for ribbing 16in circular or 32in circular for magic loop method us 7 / 4 5mm for working body of hat 16in circular and dpn s or 32in for magic loop method **gauge** 20 sts and 26 row = 4in/10cm in st st **notions** 1 stitch marker yarn needle **finished measurements** brim circumference is approximately 18 /46cm unstretched stretches to fit a 20-22 /51-56cm head circumference *happy knitting from my home to yours * you can read more about the yarnster hat here 1 on my blog 1 http //veryshannon com/blog/2013/02/free-pattern-yarnster-hat
